Position.name: Minh họa
Position.description: Up to four (4) one-character alphabetic codes (recorded in alphabetical order) that indicate the presence of types of illustrations in the item. If fewer than four alphabetic codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#)

Position.name: Target audience
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that describes the intellectual level of the target audience for which the material is intended

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic that specifies the form of material for the item

Position.name: Nature of contents
Position.description: Up to four one-character codes that indicate whether a significant part of the item is or contains certain types of material. If fewer than four codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#)

Value.description: Surveys of literature in a subject area

Position.name: Government publication
Position.description: One-character code that indicates whether or not the item is published or produced by or for an international, national, state, provincial, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body

Value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

Position.name: conference publication
Position.description: One-character code that indicates whether the item consists of the proceedings, reports, or summaries of a conference.

Position.name: festschrift
Position.description: One-character code that indicates whether the item is a festschrift

Position.name: Chỉ số
Position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item includes an index to its own contents

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Literary form
Position.description: One-character code used to indicate the literary form of an item. Numeric codes 0 and 1 provide a generic identification of whether or not the item is a work of fiction. Alphabetic codes may be used to identify specific literary forms.

Position.name: Hồi ký, tiểu sử
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether or not an item contains biographical material, and if so, what the biographical characteristics are.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|)

Position.name: Target audience
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code describes indicates the target audience for which the material is intended

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Two undefined character positions; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Type of computer file
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of computer file described in the bibliographic record

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: One-character code that contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Government publication
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the computer file is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency (including intergovernmental bodies of all types), any subdivision of such a body and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.

Value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Six undefined character positions; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Relief
Position.description: Up to four one-character alphabetic codes that indicate the relief type specified on the item. Codes are recorded in order of their importance to the described item. If fewer than four codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and each unused position contains a blank (#)

Position.name: Projection
Position.description: Two-character alphabetic code that indicates the projection used in producing the item.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Type of cartographic material
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of cartographic item described.

Value.description: Bound as part of another work

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; Each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|)

Position.name: Government publication
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the item is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.

Value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the form of material for the item.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Chỉ số
Position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item or accompanying material includes a location index or gazetteer.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Special format characteristics
Position.description: Up to two one-character alphabetic codes that indicate the special format characteristics of the map. Codes are recorded in order of their importance to the described item. If only one code is assigned, it is left justified and the unused position contains a blank (#).

Position.name: Form of composition
Position.description: Two-character alphabetic code that indicates the form of composition. Codes are based on Library of Congress subject headings. If more than one code is appropriate, the code mu (Multiple forms) is used in 008/18-19 and all appropriate specific codes are given in field 047 (Form of Composition). Code mu (Multiple forms) may also signify that field 047 (Form of Composition) contains non-MARC composition codes.

Value.description: Divertimentos, serenades, cassations, divertissements, and notturni

Position.name: Format of music
Position.description: One-character code that indicates the format of a musical composition (e.g., piano-conductor score). "Staff notation" in this element refers to music written using staves. "Musical notation" refers to music written using staves or graphic, symbolic, or word-based notation.

Value.description: Full score, miniature or study size
No parts in hand or not specified

Position.name: Target audience
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that describes the intellectual level of the target audience for which the material is intended

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item being described.

Position.name: Accompanying matter
Position.description: Up to six one-character alphabetic codes (recorded in alphabetical order) that indicate the contents of program notes and other accompanying material for sound recording, music manuscripts, or notated music. If fewer than six codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and each unused position contains a blank (#).

Value.description: biography of performer or history of ensemble
Technical and/or historical information on instruments

Position.name: Literary text for sound recordings
Position.description: Up to two one-character codes (recorded in the order of the following list) that indicate the type of literary text contained in a nonmusical sound recording. If only one code is assigned, it is left justified and the unused position contains a blank (#).

Value.description: Item is a music sound recording

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Transposition and arrangement
Position.description: Whether all or part of the item being cataloged is a transposition and/or arrangement of another work.

Value.description: Not arrangement or transposition or not specified

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Tần suất phát hành
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the frequency of an item; used in conjunction with 008/19 (Regularity).

Position.name: Quy tắc
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the intended regularity of an item; used in conjunction with 008/18 (Frequency).

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Type of continuing resource
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of continuing resource.

Position.name: Form of original item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the form of material in which an item was originally published.

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item being described

Position.name: Nature of entire work
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the nature of an item if it consists entirely of a certain type of material. If the item can be considered more than one type of material, the types are recorded in 008/25-27 (Nature of contents) and 008/24 position is coded blank (#).

Value.description: Surveys of literature in a subject area

Position.name: Nature of contents
Position.description: Up to three one-character alphabetic codes (recorded in alphabetical order) that indicate that a work contains certain types of materials. If fewer than three codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and each unused position contains a blank (#).

Value.description: Surveys of literature in a subject area

Position.name: Government publication
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether an item is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.

Value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

Position.name: conference publication
Position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether an item consists of the proceedings, reports, or summaries of a conference.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Original alphabet or script of title
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the original alphabet or script of the language of the title on the source item upon which the key title (field 222) is based.

Value.description: No alphabet or script given/No key title

Position.name: Entry convention
Position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item was cataloged according to successive entry, latest entry, or integrated entry cataloging conventions.

Value.description: Three-dimensional artifact or naturally occurring object

Position.name: Running time for motion pictures and videorecordings
Position.description: Three-digit number that indicates the total running time of the motion picture or videorecording. The number is right justified and each unused position contains a zero.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Target audience
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the audience for which the item is intended.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Government publication
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the item is published or produced by or for an international, provincial, national, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.

Value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Type of visual material
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of visual material being described.

Position.name: Technique
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the technique used in creating motion in motion pictures or videorecordings.

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).

Position.name: Form of item
Position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item being described

Position.name: Không xác định
Position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
